title: Expand product catalog with additional collection items

requirements.summary: Display new products in the existing ProductGrid component without modifying grid structure or styling
acceptanceCriteria: All backend products render automatically in the product grid
Grid maintains responsive behavior with proper spacing
New products display with 'Add to Bag' functionality identical to existing items

file_operations.description: Add mappings for the four new product images (sweatshirt, chinos, oxford-shirt, wool-scarf) to the productImages record, associating them with product IDs 5-8. Reference the generated image files at frontend/public/assets/generated/sweatshirt.dim_800x1000.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/chinos.dim_800x1000.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/oxford-shirt.dim_800x1000.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/wool-scarf.dim_800x1000.png. The existing grid rendering logic will automatically display all products from the backend including the new ones.
